trans-unit.source: You have been invited to join {host_name} by {inviter_name}
trans-unit.target: You have been invited to join {host_name} by {inviter_name}

trans-unit.source: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to accept the invitation: <{url}>, this invite will expire in **24 hours**.
trans-unit.target: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to accept the invitation: <{url}>, this invite will expire in **24 hours**.

trans-unit.source: You have been invited to watch a private performance
trans-unit.target: You have been invited to watch a private performance

trans-unit.source: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to watch **{performance_name}** by **{host_name}** on StageUp now: <{url}>>
trans-unit.target: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to watch **{performance_name}** by **{host_name}** on StageUp now: <{url}>>

trans-unit.source: Receipt of purchase of StageUp ticket
trans-unit.target: Receipt of purchase of StageUp ticket

trans-unit.source: Hi {user_name}, You purchased a {ticket_name} to watch {performance_name} for {amount}. Click here to watch: <{watch_url}> Receipt of this purchase: <{receipt_url}>
trans-unit.target: Hi {user_name}, You purchased a {ticket_name} to watch {performance_name} for {amount}. Click here to watch: <{watch_url}> Receipt of this purchase: <{receipt_url}>

trans-unit.source:
Hi {user_name}, Thank you for supporting **{host_name}**!
Your patron payments of {amount} will be debited on {date_ordinal} of each month, starting today.
You can cancel your payments at any time. By making this payment you agree to [StageUp's Terms of Use]({tos_url}) Thanks, StageUp Team
trans-unit.target:
Hi {user_name}, Thank you for supporting **{host_name}**!
Your patron payments of {amount} will be debited on {date_ordinal} of each month, starting today.
You can cancel your payments at any time. By making this payment you agree to [StageUp's Terms of Use]({tos_url}) Thanks, StageUp Team

trans-unit.source:
Hi **{host_name}**,
@{user_username} is not a patron of your company.
_ Patron Tier: **{tier_name}** _ Amount: **{amount}**
trans-unit.target:
Hi **{host_name}**,
@{user_username} is not a patron of your company.
_ Patron Tier: **{tier_name}** _ Amount: **{amount}**

trans-unit.source:
Hi **{user_name}**, You are receiving this because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of the password for your StageUp account.
Please click on the following link to complete the process. This link is valid for the next 24 hours.
<{password_reset_url}>
If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target:
Hi **{user_name}**, You are receiving this because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of the password for your StageUp account.
Please click on the following link to complete the process. This link is valid for the next 24 hours.
<{password_reset_url}>
If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

trans-unit.source: Your StageUp password was just changed
trans-unit.target: Your StageUp password was just changed

trans-unit.source:
Your StageUp account password has recently been changed. If you did not make this change, please login into your account and change your password as soon as possible.
If you have recently changed your password, then please ignore this email.
trans-unit.target:
Your StageUp account password has recently been changed. If you did not make this change, please login into your account and change your password as soon as possible.
If you have recently changed your password, then please ignore this email.

trans-unit.source: StageUp: Your refund request has been sent to @{host_name}
trans-unit.target: StageUp: Your refund request has been sent to @{host_name}

trans-unit.source:
Hi **{user_name}**, Your refund request for the following invoice has been sent to **{host_name}**.
_ Invoice #: **{invoice_id}** _ Performance: **{performance_name}** _ Purchased: **{purchase_date}** _ Amount" **{amount}**
We'll let you know when the host has processed your request
trans-unit.target:
Hi **{user_name}**, Your refund request for the following invoice has been sent to **{host_name}**.
_ Invoice #: **{invoice_id}** _ Performance: **{performance_name}** _ Purchased: **{purchase_date}** _ Amount" **{amount}**
We'll let you know when the host has processed your request

trans-unit.source: Must be logged in to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Must be logged in to perform this action

trans-unit.source: Must be a Site Admin to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Must be a Site Admin to perform this action

trans-unit.source: Missing a field in the provided data
trans-unit.target: Missing a field in the provided data

trans-unit.source: Your account must be verified to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Your account must be verified to perform this action
